scripts.test: (cd wsi-test-helper && yarn tsc) && (cd webpack-subresource-integrity && yarn tsc && yarn jest --detectOpenHandles --forceExit)
scripts.test:unit: cd webpack-subresource-integrity && yarn tsc && yarn jest --detectOpenHandles --forceExit unit.test.ts
scripts.test:integration: cd webpack-subresource-integrity && yarn tsc && yarn jest --detectOpenHandles --forceExit integration.test.ts
scripts.build: cd webpack-subresource-integrity && yarn tsc && yarn api-extractor run --local --verbose
scripts.cover:run: rm -Rf .nyc_output && mkdir -p .nyc_output && rm -Rf .nyc_merged && mkdir -p .nyc_merged && (cd wsi-test-helper && yarn tsc) && cd webpack-subresource-integrity && yarn tsc && yarn nyc instrument --in-place=true "$PWD/webpack-subresource-integrity" && USE_COVERAGE=1 yarn jest --coverage --detectOpenHandles --forceExit --verbose && cp coverage/coverage-final.json ../.nyc_output/ && cd ../nyc-apply-source-map && yarn node ./index.js ../.nyc_output ../.nyc_merged
scripts.cover:lcov: cd webpack-subresource-integrity && yarn nyc report --reporter=text-lcov --cwd=.. > coverage/lcov.info
